triples.name: Distributed artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper is a comprehensive survey of distributed AI, its scientific classification, and social capacities of agents.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Intelligent agents are the fundamental building blocks discussed in the paper's analysis of distributed AI systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multi-agent systems are core to distributed problem-solving and cooperation mechanisms that the paper analyzes.

triples.name: Problem solving
triples.relevance: Distributed problem-solving is the central application domain discussed in the paper's framework for DAI.

triples.name: Agent Communications Language
triples.relevance: Agent communication protocols are essential mechanisms for cooperation and coordination in the distributed AI systems discussed.
